西红柿和番茄红素：吃更多的食用可以降低癌症的风险吗？较高的饮食和血液番茄红素水平与降低的癌症风险有关，对肺癌死亡率的保护作用最强。但是，这些发现是观察性的，需要进一步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/tomatoes-and-lycopene-can-eating-more-reduce-reduce-your-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/tomatoes-and-lycopene-can-eating-more-reduce-reduce-your-cancer-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4201B9A7-168F-45DC-8EE1-9E541F57013B Sun, 02 Mar 2025 22:07:00 -0500 Tomatoes and lycopene: Can eating more reduce your cancer risk?
早期CPAP治疗可能会降低帕金森氏症患者的帕金森氏病风险根据今天于2025年3月2日发布的初步研究，该呼吸暂停的人患有帕金森氏病的风险增加，但如果足够及早开始，持续的阳性气道压力（CPAP）可能会降低这种风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/early-cpap-warteatment-may-readment-may-reduce-parkinsons-disease-risk-insease-risk-in-peeople-with-sleep-apnea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250302/early-cpap-warteatment-may-reduce-parkinsons-disease-parkinson-disease-risk-in-people-inpeople-with-sleep-apnea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c51636d7-9283-4f4d-b050-c19f00841012 Sun, 02 Mar 2025 21:50:00 -0500 Early CPAP treatment may reduce Parkinson's disease risk in people with sleep apnea
